Explore our enormous collection of stylish icons, themes, wallpapers, and widgets! You’re free to jazz up your phone’s Lock & Home Screens to your taste.


And it's not just about the look. With Themify widgets for Lock & Home screens and StandBy, you can keep the info you need handy, turn your phone into a smart display, and even have a digital pet right on your screen!


COMPLETE MAKEOVER of your device!

Themify gives you a wide range of tools to express yourself. With our app, you're free to customize your phone to your liking. Enjoy state-of-the-art content and unleash your creativity!

Key features:


■ 3-in-1 Themes


Whether you love dark hues or you’re a diehard pastel fan, you can decorate your screen to create a harmonious space! Install a theme that suits your taste, and watch your app icons, widgets, and wallpapers come together seamlessly.


■ Vast Widget Collection
Interactive widgets to track activities that are important to you, e.g., sleep or steps
Widgets with time & calendar, weather, inspiring quotes, or just eye-pleasing pics—add any info right to your Home & Lock Screens
Cute digital pets (remember to feed and bathe them!)
Widgets for StandBy with always-on time, date, or real-time weather
Informative widgets created especially for iPad

■ Theme Maker

If you’d like to add a personal touch to your Home Screen theme, use our Theme Maker. Feel completely free to change whatever you want and create a one-of-a-kind design for your device.


■ 2000+ Icon Packs


For those who are bored with the same standard app icons, we have an array of custom icon packs. You'll surely find content that resonates with your unique taste!


■ Live and Still Wallpapers

Anime, Urban, Animals, Nature, Cars, just to name a few—we have still and live wallpapers for every taste and mood! With Themify, you're entirely free to choose any wallpaper that perfectly suits your vibe.


■ Apple Health Integration 


Sync Themify with the Health app and effortlessly track your daily sleep, steps, and water intake from convenient and stylish widgets.

Arvin®: Your AI-Powered Logo Maker

Transform your brand identity effortlessly with Arvin®, the AI-driven logo maker that helps you create stunning logos in seconds—no design skills required.Ideal for both novices and professionals, Arvin® brings the convenience of quick, high-quality logo creation straight to your fingertips.

Whether you’re crafting a personal avatar, a promotional icon for products, or a distinctive brand emblem, Arvin® translates your ideas into logos that capture and convey the very essence of your vision.

[Customize Freely and Creatively]
Manipulate and morph your logos across a vast spectrum of styles, from minimalist to intricate, or classic to contemporary. 

[Diverse Applications for Every Need]
With Arvin®, your logo goes beyond traditional uses. Create engaging personal avatars for social media, eye-catching icons for your product line, or professional logos for corporate branding—all reflecting a cohesive identity that resonates with your target audience.

[Effortless Sharing and Deployment]
Once you've designed your perfect logo, sharing it is just as easy. Arvin® ensures that each logo is optimized for use across all platforms—from digital advertisements to print media—maintaining its integrity and appeal in every format.

[Infinite Creative Freedom]
Arvin® is not just an AI logo maker; it’s a gateway to limitless artistic exploration. Beyond branding, you can engage with an array of visual art capabilities, exploring and creating without limits. Arvin® adapts to your creative demands, offering endless possibilities to reflect your unique style and ideas.

Transform Your Ideas into Iconic Logos Today

Transform your iPhone into a personal masterpiece with Wallpics, the ultimate destination for stunning live wallpapers, DIY wallpaper creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper sets, and true 4K quality backgrounds. Whether you’re looking to refresh your lockscreen or craft a cohesive home-and-lockscreen theme, Wallpics delivers everything you need to make your device truly yours.

Endless Live Wallpapers & 4K Quality Backgrounds
• Dive into a vast library of dynamic live wallpapers in breathtaking 4K quality—fluid animations that bring motion and depth to your lockscreen and home screen.
• Browse categories from abstract art and nature scenes to futuristic cityscapes, all rendered in ultra-high definition for crisp, vibrant visuals.
• Enjoy smooth playback and perfect compatibility with iOS’s Live Photo lockscreen feature—your screen has never looked this alive.

DIY Wallpaper Studio
• Unleash your creativity with Wallpics’s intuitive wallpaper maker. Mix and match patterns, colors, and textures to design your own custom backgrounds in minutes.
• Add text, overlays, and stickers—or start with our premium templates to craft a signature look.
• Export your creations in both standard and 4K resolutions, ready to set as your lockscreen, home screen, or share with friends.

Charging Animations & Dynamic Effects
• Impress every time you plug in: choose from a gallery of charging animations that light up around your battery icon—so fun, you’ll look forward to low battery!
• From neon pulses and sparkles to liquid fills and energy ripples, our power-on effects are fully customizable and optimized for iOS.

Premium PFP Icons & Matching Wallpaper Sets
• Personalize your social profiles with a curated collection of pfp icons—stylized avatars, minimalist logos, and neon glyphs that pop on any background.
• Coordinate your entire device aesthetic with matching wallpaper bundles—lockscreen and home screen designs that complement each other perfectly.
• Keep your theme cohesive across apps by exporting both backgrounds and pfp icons at once.

Features at a Glance

Live Wallpapers: Animated lockscreen backgrounds & home screen motion

DIY Wallpaper: Custom background studio with templates, text & stickers

Charging Animations: Dynamic power-on effects for every charge

PFP Icons: Profile picture avatars in multiple styles and resolutions

Matching Wallpaper Sets: Coordinated lockscreen + home screen bundles

4K Quality: Ultra-HD backgrounds and exports

Ready to elevate your iPhone experience? Download Wallpics now and unlock a universe of live wallpapers, DIY creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper, and 4K quality backgrounds—tailored just for you!

iScreen - personalized homescreen with various Widgets & Themes & Wallpaper to make your phone screen stand out!

You can not only keep pets and grow plants on the Dynamic Island, customize your Lock Screen with Interactive, Weather, Battery, Launcher, X-Panel, Text & Icon, Animation, Work Clock, Step Count widgets, but also add Home Screen widgets like Dynamic Panel, Photos, Scrolling Album, To-Do List, Countdown, Digital Clock, Calendar, Emoji Notes, Fan, Air Conditioner, and more for greater fun. Besides widgets, iScreen also offers various Themes, Wallpapers, AI-generated artwork, Charging Animations, and other features to make your phone screen more beautiful and unique.

Special feature:  
【iOS 26】
Fun iOS 26 Features, customized with 1000+ 3D space wallpapers and themes. Added dynamic Control Center effects to make your phone truly one-of-a-kind!

【Control Center】
Customize your Control Center style with colorful icons. Features include a Counter, Water Reminder, Book of Answers, Dice Roll, and Quick Launch—combining beauty and practicality.

【DIY Wallpapers】
Create static or dynamic wallpapers with rich templates like Polaroid, Heart Puzzle, Flip Card, and Animated Marquee Lights to make your home screen unique.

【Widgets】
Includes popular widgets such as Dynamic Panel, Photo Wall, Weather, Battery, Countdown, Calendar, X-Panel, Emoji Notes, Digital Clock, Ferris Wheel, Windmill, and Air Conditioner. It also offers creative lock screen styles like Emojis, Animations, and Icons, with support for transparent effects — making your phone both fun and practical.

【Charging Animation】
Cool and interesting charging animations with custom effects for a personalized charging experience.

【Couple Widgets】
Sweet widgets designed for couples and friends. Send messages and photos to each other’s screens, and check real-time distance, weather, and moods.

【Interactive Widgets】
Quickly complete to-do check-ins or play games like Whack-a-Mole and Arcade without opening the app—adding fun to your daily routine.

【Themes & Wallpapers】

With just a single product photo, Pixury helps you create professional product images and promotional videos. Whether you are an e-commerce seller, a social media creator, an entrepreneur, or a small business owner, Pixury empowers you to instantly generate eye-catching visuals that make your products stand out on social platforms and online marketplaces—driving more attention, engagement, and sales.

Traditionally, producing high-quality product photos and ad videos requires complex design software, professional editing skills, or outsourcing to expensive designers. This process is time-consuming and costly. With Pixury’s cutting-edge AI technology, everything becomes simple and efficient. All you need is one ordinary photo of your product—Pixury takes care of the rest: background removal, background replacement, model generation, marketing poster creation, and even ad video production. Everything can be done in just a few taps.

Key Features
 - AI Photo Editing: Automatically remove unwanted backgrounds, replace them with custom scenes, add shadows, or erase distracting objects—making your product look sharp and professional.
 - AI Model Generation: Place your product into realistic lifestyle scenarios or on virtual models without the need for expensive photo shoots.
 - AI Posters & Marketing Images: Access a wide range of professional templates tailored for e-commerce and social media. Simply insert your product image and instantly create stunning promotional visuals.
 - AI Video Generation: No video editing skills required. Choose from trending ad or social media video templates, and Pixury will generate high-quality promotional videos for your brand.
 - Batch Processing: Quickly create multiple product images or videos at once, saving time and boosting efficiency.

Why Choose Pixury?
 - Save Time: What used to take hours or even days can now be done in minutes.
 - Cut Costs: No need for expensive design software or outsourced services.
 - Easy to Use: No design skills required—just upload your product photo and get professional results.
 - Boost Conversions: High-quality images and videos grab attention, drive social engagement, and increase sales potential.

Who Is It For?
Pixury is designed for anyone looking to improve their product presentation:
 - E-commerce sellers (Amazon, Shopify, Etsy, Taobao, Pinduoduo, etc.) who want polished product images and ad creatives.
 - Social media creators (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube, and more) looking to produce engaging product content effortlessly.
 - Small business owners and entrepreneurs who want professional-quality marketing visuals without breaking the budget.

With Pixury, you don’t need complicated tools or external teams. All it takes is your smartphone to create stunning product photos and promotional videos anytime, anywhere. Bring your ideas to life, showcase your products to the world, and turn every visual into a sales opportunity.

Pixury — Your AI-powered design assistant for product photos and videos. Simple, professional, and effective.
